@jeonsann Also if you're comparing this to Itaimai, trying to figure out if it'll be NTR there or not, after chapter 10 of Itaimai, I'm guessing there will be. Ryoh-zoh switches between 2 story types, Comedy and Drama, and he'll mix in NTR tropes as the story goes along. One of his earliest works is a web-comic series called Better Girls (38654), where he plays around a lot with those tropes. There's a chapter where the MC is locked in a locker by his sister and is forced to watch her and 2 other girls have a lesbian sex session with the MC's crush. But then the story ends with a harem ending and he acts like that didn't even happen. But then you have his stories like Ray's Days, where the stories told there are wholesome/ vanilla for the most part, but he'll still add NTR elements. Itaimai kept playing with an NTR trope of imagination, but based off his previous works, it seems very likely that since it's more Drama focused, the FMC will cheat at least once before the story ends.

@jeonsann You can find the raws for chapter 9-16 in COMIC Ananga Ranga Vol 17-25. But if you want a quick rundown of how it ends, spoilers for the ending: Basically it plays kind of like a NTR story with Hina, since all of the guys and even Mei keep having sex with Hina behind the presidents back. Jun has a chapter where films an entire club (swimming club I think?) gang bang Hina. The final chapter just turns into a student council orgy. Ending is a Netorase Happy ending, Jun and Hina stay together and keep having sex with everyone else.
